comments.author: Dave
comments.body: SB drew quite a crowd in the ATLAS lobby yesterday as he put the Opracycle 900 through its paces. He gave the TAM kids who were hanging around comparing ringtones quite a physics lesson. Principles of applied torque, dynamic tension, entropy, atrophy, apostrophe, and catastrophe were all in evidence as our rotund brother put eight pounds of pizza into his metabolic hopper and turned it into pure energy. Jaws dropped, oaths were muttered, and bearings overheated. Thanks for the demo, Steve! You earned that 62 oz. Slurpee!
